text: The 2019 Malaysia Challenge Cup group stage featured 7 teams. The teams were drawn into one groups of four and another with three teams, and played each other home-and-away in a round-robin format. The top two teams in each group advanced to the semi finals. The group stage will start on 5 August 2019 and concludes on 12 September 2019. ==Groups== ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 in Malaysian football
title: 2019 Malaysia Challenge Cup group stage
